description: Try our easy to follow Banana & Almond Ice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice-cream,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Banana & Almond Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 56 bananas, frozen (peel & slice prior to freezing)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend frozen bananas and almond spread in a highspeed blender or food processor until creamy and completely mixed in. The banana ice cream will be slightly melted, like soft serve ice cream.
Pour the almond spread banana ice cream into a greased pan/container and place it in the freezer for 12 hours.
